title: Broan-Nutone AE50 InVent Series Single-Speed Fan, Ceiling Room-Side Installation Bathroom Exhaust Fan, ENERGY STAR Certified, 0.5 Sones, 50 CFM , White , 50 CFM 0.5 Sones
features: HIGH-QUALITY FAN: Quiet, ENERGY STAR certified exhaust fan operates with 50 CFM and 0.5 Sones to help control air quality is powerful enough for rooms (including bathroom) up to 45 sq. ft.
EFFICIENT: Powerful ventilation reduces to quickly eliminate fogged mirrors at 50 CFM, so your vision will always be clear and your surroundings will always be comfortable
EASY INSTALLATION: Easy to install new/replace existing product with retrofit installations that can be done entirely from the room-side â€“ no attic access required

RELIABLE PERFORMANCE: With our TrueSeal Damper Technology, InVent fans reduce air leakage by up to 50% compared to competitive models, resulting in better home performance via blower door tests and reducing cold and warm air backdrafts

GREAT FOR BATHROOM: UL Listed for use over tubs and showers with a GFCI circuit so you can capture the steam before it spreads throughout the room by placing your fan exactly where you need it the most
description: Ensure comfort in your bathroom with the Broan InVent Bathroom Exhaust Fan! This high-quality ENERGY STAR certified single speed fan reduces in your bathroom at 50 CFM up to 45 sq. ft. The compact housing is designed to mount directly to inboard joists, making retrofit or new installation applications easy and simple. With our TrueSeal damper technology, InVent fans reduce air leakage by up to 50% compared to competitive models, resulting in better home performance via blower door tests and reducing cold and warm air back drafts. Retrofit installation is easy with the EzDuct Connector and can be done entirely room-side - no need to crawl up into your attic! It can be used over the bathtub or shower with the GFCI circuit. Upgrade your bathroom with the Broan InVent Bathroom Exhaust Fan today!
